citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC has not reviewed the research facility's Program for Animal Care and Use or inspected the animal facilities at
least once every 6 months as required under the provisions of the Animal Welfare Act (AWA). An inspection and program
review were conducted on May 9, 2024, and December 10, 2024. This timeframe exceeds the 6 months permitted
between semiannual program reviews and facility inspections. Failure to conduct semiannual program reviews and facility
inspections within the specified timeframe under the provisions of the AWA prevents a complete and thorough evaluation
of animal care and use. The facility must ensure that semiannual inspections and program reviews are completed at least
once every 6 months. To be corrected by December 17, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC has not reviewed the research facility's Program for Animal Care and Use or inspected the animal facilities at 
least once every 6 months as required under the provisions of the Animal Welfare Act (AWA). An inspection and program 
review were conducted on May 9, 2024, and December 10, 2024. This timeframe exceeds the 6 months permitted 
between semiannual program reviews and facility inspections. Failure to conduct semiannual program reviews and facility 
inspections within the specified timeframe under the provisions of the AWA prevents a complete and thorough evaluation 
of animal care and use. The facility must ensure that semiannual inspections and program reviews are completed at least 
once every 6 months. To be corrected by December 17, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
